Category.Name: Architectural Wonders
Category.Text: A collection of the most elegant and refined architectural models throughout history.

Event.Name: Modest Architectural Exhibition
Event.Text: These construction plans are now free for us! They will surely enrich our city!

Threshold.Name: 1 City Signage
Threshold.Text: A bit of signage to cheaply embellish your city.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_advertisingcolumn
Reward.Text: It expands with every layer of posters.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_advertisingpanel
Reward.Text: The best place to keep up with the latests theatrical productions.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_flag
Reward.Text: Flaps gracefully in the coastal breeze.

Threshold.Name: 2 City Furnitures
Threshold.Text: A few signs and paving variations.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_secondground
Reward.Text: Step on art.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_advertisingpanel
Reward.Text: The best place to keep up with the latests theatrical productions.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_flag
Reward.Text: Flaps gracefully in the coastal breeze.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_advertisingcolumn
Reward.Text: It expands with every layer of posters.

Threshold.Name: 3 Plaza Design
Threshold.Text: All you need to design a small plaza in your city.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_secondground
Reward.Text: Step on art.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_advertisingpanel
Reward.Text: The best place to keep up with the latests theatrical productions.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_flag
Reward.Text: Flaps gracefully in the coastal breeze.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_advertisingcolumn
Reward.Text: It expands with every layer of posters.

Threshold.Name: 4 Esplanade Design
Threshold.Text: A very elegant pack of mosaics and colonnades for a beautiful esplanade.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_secondground
Reward.Text: Step on art.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_columnsstraight
Reward.Text: There's a sense of immensity that comes with them.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_columnsangle
Reward.Text: There's a sense of immensity that comes with them.

Threshold.Name: 5 Fountain Architecture
Threshold.Text: The latest creation to bring clean water to your city with a flourish.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinstraight
Reward.Text: Elegant and serene.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinend
Reward.Text: Elegant and serene.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinangle
Reward.Text: Elegant and serene.

Threshold.Text: A few aesthetic additions for the water features of your city.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinstraight
Reward.Text: Elegant and serene.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinstraightfountain
Reward.Text: There's no heart that can't be appeased by the gentle sounds of water.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinbridge
Reward.Text: What could be more romantic than contemplating your reflections together?

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinend
Reward.Text: Elegant and serene.

Reward.Name: culture_1x1_basinangle
Reward.Text: Elegant and serene.

Threshold.Name: 9 World Fair Annexe
Threshold.Text: Buildings and pavillions to build a beautiful annexe for your World's Fair.

Reward.Name: culture_1x3_buildinggate
Reward.Text: The most impressive entrance to the World Fair.

Reward.Name: culture_4x3_pavillion
Reward.Text: A magnificent addendum to your monument,

Reward.Name: culture_2x2_tower
Reward.Text: A modern architectural landmark to accompany the finest events.

Category.Name: Science and Technics
Category.Text: A showcase of modern innovation through astonishing devices.

Event.Name: Modest Science Exhibition
Event.Text: These new devices will forward our industry to a point never reached before!

Threshold.Name: 1 Basic Tools
Threshold.Text: Mostly mechanical tools of little value.

Reward.Name: Millstone
Reward.Text: Lifts the one from around your neck...

Reward.Name: Bow Saw
Reward.Text: A new standard in saws.

Reward.Name: Trap
Reward.Text: Might catch the odd furry critter with this.

Reward.Name: Secateur
Reward.Text: Sharpens up resource gathering.

Reward.Name: Plough
Reward.Text: Agricultural revolution!

Reward.Name: Churn Drill
Reward.Text: A simple modern hand-drill.

Reward.Name: Mechanical Loom
Reward.Text: They can work it in their sleep.

Reward.Name: Magnifier
Reward.Text: Lose sight of tiny cogs and sparklers no more.

Reward.Name: Fishing Net
Reward.Text: Nothing slips the net.

Reward.Name: Blowpipe
Reward.Text: Now anyone can blow a perfect sphere.

Reward.Name: Circular Saw
Reward.Text: Lend your carpenters a hand.

Reward.Name: Steel Moulds
Reward.Text: Encourages some uniformity.

Reward.Name: Old Bell
Reward.Text: The old toll of toil.

Reward.Name: Dynamo
Reward.Text: A volatile source of electric power.

Reward.Name: Calciner
Reward.Text: Smelts the candle at both ends.

Reward.Name: Freight Elevator
Reward.Text: Something to lift miner's spirits.

Reward.Name: Oven
Reward.Text: Hot plates.

Threshold.Name: 2 Basic Equipment
Threshold.Text: First hand equipment to reinforce your buildings and production.

Reward.Name: Old Bell
Reward.Text: The old toll of toil.

Reward.Name: Dynamo
Reward.Text: A volatile source of electric power.

Reward.Name: Calciner
Reward.Text: Smelts the candle at both ends.

Reward.Name: Freight Elevator
Reward.Text: Something to lift miner's spirits.

Reward.Name: Oven
Reward.Text: Hot plates.

Reward.Name: Planer
Reward.Text: A helping hand for cutting.

Reward.Name: Steam Conveyor
Reward.Text: Gets everything into line.

Reward.Name: Brew Kettle
Reward.Text: Accelerates the brewing process.

Reward.Name: Iron-Framing
Reward.Text: Reduces the risk of fire.

Reward.Name: Stable
Reward.Text: Cram animals into a small space.

Reward.Name: Covered Containment
Reward.Text: Keep the stench to a minimum.

Threshold.Name: 3 Common Seeds
Threshold.Text: Low quality seeds that still ensure your crops to grow where you desire.

Reward.Name: Mixed Grain Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout a few fields of Grain in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Hop Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout a few fields of Hops in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Potato Seeds
Reward.Text: These sprouts can help you grow a few fields of Potato in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Grape Seeds
Reward.Text: These vines can help you grow a few fields of Grapes in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Bell Pepper Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you grow a few fields of Peppers in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Sugar Cane Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings can help you grow a few fields of Sugar Cane in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Tobacco Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you grow a few fields of Tobacco in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Cotton Seeds
Reward.Text: These cotton seeds can help you grow a few fields of Cotton in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Cocoa Seeds
Reward.Text: These beans can help you grow a few groves of cocoa in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Caoutchouc Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings can help you grow a few groves of Caoutchouc in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Coffee Seeds
Reward.Text: These beans can help you grow a few groves of Coffee in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Mixed Corn Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout a few fields of Corn in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Grain Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout plentiful fields of Grain in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Hop Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout plentiful fields of Hops in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Potato Seeds
Reward.Text: These sprouts can help you grow plentiful fields of Potato in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Grape Seeds
Reward.Text: These vines can help you grow plentiful fields of Grapes in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Bell Pepper Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you grow plentiful fields of Peppers in alien soil.

Threshold.Name: 4 Advanced Tools
Threshold.Text: Some advanced technology at the service of your production.

Reward.Name: Churn Drill
Reward.Text: A simple modern hand-drill.

Reward.Name: Mechanical Loom
Reward.Text: They can work it in their sleep.

Reward.Name: Magnifier
Reward.Text: Lose sight of tiny cogs and sparklers no more.

Reward.Name: Fishing Net
Reward.Text: Nothing slips the net.

Reward.Name: Blowpipe
Reward.Text: Now anyone can blow a perfect sphere.

Reward.Name: Circular Saw
Reward.Text: Lend your carpenters a hand.

Reward.Name: Steel Moulds
Reward.Text: Encourages some uniformity.

Reward.Name: French Burrstone
Reward.Text: Will pulverise your grinding issues to a fine mist.

Reward.Name: Two-Man Saw
Reward.Text: See-saw no more, with this speedy saw.

Reward.Name: Leghold Trap
Reward.Text: This certainly makes sure they won't get away.

Reward.Name: Lopper
Reward.Text: Keeping pruning tradition alive.

Reward.Name: Cast Steel Plough
Reward.Text: An extremely balanced approach to agriculture!

Reward.Name: Drill Press
Reward.Text: A mechanical drill to reduce operator effort.

Reward.Name: Precision Monocular
Reward.Text: Allows your precision craftsman to examine the fine details.

Reward.Name: Drift Net
Reward.Text: Originating on the so-named "crab coast," this whopper of a net is a treat for fishermen.

Reward.Name: Iron Factory Bell
Reward.Text: Once heard, cannot be unheard.

Reward.Name: Steam Turbine
Reward.Text: A safe source of electric power.

Reward.Name: Reverberatory Furnace
Reward.Text: Saves time, but not the environment.

Reward.Name: French Burrstone
Reward.Text: Will pulverise your grinding issues to a fine mist.

Reward.Name: Safety Steam-Powered Elevator
Reward.Text: A steam-geared elevator that can lift ten tonnes in one go.

Reward.Name: Cast Iron Stove
Reward.Text: A way into fast food!

Threshold.Name: 5 Chemical Research
Threshold.Text: The product of the latest research in chemistry.

Reward.Name: Melting Point Apparatus
Reward.Text: Never ruin another batch, with precise control of temparatures!

Reward.Name: Artificial Fertilizer
Reward.Text: An acrid-smelling fertiliser.

Reward.Name: Antibiotics
Reward.Text: Keeps livestock from the threat of disease.

Reward.Name: Grain Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout plentiful fields of Grain in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Banana Seeds

Reward.Name: Pearls Seeds
Reward.Text: This spawn can help you grow a large colony of oyster in unfamiliar waters.

Reward.Text: Measures temperature precisely.

Reward.Text: A foul-smelling fertiliser.

Reward.Name: Vitamins
Reward.Text: Peps-up haggard-looking livestock.

Threshold.Name: 6 High End Equipment
Threshold.Text: The best tools and structures to reinforce your production.

Reward.Name: Cast-Iron Doric Columns
Reward.Text: Reduces the risk of fire, and looks nice.

Reward.Name: Equiped Barn
Reward.Text: Encourage animals to spend more time together.

Reward.Name: Covered Lagoon
Reward.Text: Manage your livestock waste in a clean, sustainable way.

Reward.Name: Iron-And-Glass Structure
Reward.Text: Reduces the risk of fire and looks divine.

Reward.Name: French Burrstone
Reward.Text: Will pulverise your grinding issues to a fine mist.

Reward.Name: Two-Man Saw
Reward.Text: See-saw no more, with this speedy saw.

Reward.Name: Leghold Trap
Reward.Text: This certainly makes sure they won't get away.

Reward.Name: Cast Iron Stove
Reward.Text: A way into fast food!

Threshold.Name: 7 Powered Machines
Threshold.Text: A selection of newly designed machines that use electricity to achieve miracles.

Reward.Name: Helical Planner
Reward.Text: Helical design creates less cutting waste.

Reward.Name: Steam-Powered Brewing Machine
Reward.Text: Rapidly accelerates the brewing process.

Reward.Name: Power Loom
Reward.Text: A semi-automatic loom with bells and whistles

Reward.Name: Glass Mechanical Press
Reward.Text: Blow glass bubbles with modern speed and efficiency.

Reward.Name: Electric Circular Rip Saw
Reward.Text: They can't wait to get its teeth stuck into it.

Reward.Name: Hydraulic Press
Reward.Text: Encourages rigid uniformity.

Reward.Name: Electric Assembly Line
Reward.Text: Gets everything nicely into line.

Reward.Name: Electric Powered Pumps
Reward.Text: Make your beverages speak the language of tradition with this extraordinarily capacious distiller.

Reward.Name: Electric Treadle Lathe
Reward.Text: Harker's lathe cuts through wood and metal like dough. Just make sure your fingers are well clear!

Reward.Name: Compacting Machine
Reward.Text: Neither human nor machine has yet produced faster, more uniform masonry than Mickleton's compactor.

Reward.Name: Fein Electric Drill
Reward.Text: Bores holes in the earth's crust, using the frightening power of electricity!

Reward.Name: Vaughan Drag Saw
Reward.Text: Vincent's flabbergasting creation will chop it all for you!

Reward.Name: Fur Stretcher
Reward.Text: A particularly clean and efficient dispatcher of mink.

Reward.Name: Original LÖWE
Reward.Text: A springy yet safe clipper of clippables from the near-future!

Reward.Name: Steel Seed Drill
Reward.Text: Precisely contoured modern materials make this seed drill a farmer's fantasy.

Reward.Name: Kruder Loupe
Reward.Text: Designed by the very artisans who use them, this magnifier guaranteees quality.

Reward.Name: Brixham Bottom Trawl
Reward.Text: Drifts about looking for extra fish.

Event.Name: Somptuous Science Exhibition
Event.Text: These new devices will forward our industry to a point never reached before!

Reward.Name: Potato Seeds
Reward.Text: These sprouts can help you grow plentiful fields of Potato in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Grape Seeds
Reward.Text: These vines can help you grow plentiful fields of Grapes in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Bell Pepper Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you grow plentiful fields of Peppers in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Sugar Cane Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings can help you grow plentiful fields of Sugar Cane in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Tobacco Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you grow plentiful fields of Tobacco in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Cotton Seeds
Reward.Text: These cotton seeds can help you grow plentiful fields of Cotton in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Cocoa Seeds
Reward.Text: These beans can help you grow plentiful groves of cocoa in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Caoutchouc Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings can help you grow plentiful groves of Caoutchouc in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Coffee Seeds
Reward.Text: These beans can help you grow plentiful groves of Coffee in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Corn Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds can help you sprout plentiful fields of Corn in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Banana Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings can help you grow plentiful groves of Plantain in alien soil.

Reward.Name: Pearls Seeds
Reward.Text: This spawn can help you grow a large colony of oyster in unfamiliar waters.

Reward.Name: Mercury Thermometer
Reward.Text: Measures temperature precisely.

Reward.Name: Wood Ash
Reward.Text: A foul-smelling fertiliser.

Reward.Name: Vitamins
Reward.Text: Peps-up haggard-looking livestock.

Threshold.Name: 6 High End Equipment
Threshold.Text: The best tools and structures to reinforce your production.

Reward.Name: Cast-Iron Doric Columns
Reward.Text: Reduces the risk of fire, and looks nice.

Reward.Name: Equiped Barn
Reward.Text: Encourage animals to spend more time together.

Reward.Name: Covered Lagoon
Reward.Text: Manage your livestock waste in a clean, sustainable way.

Reward.Name: Iron-And-Glass Structure
Reward.Text: Reduces the risk of fire and looks divine.

Reward.Name: French Burrstone
Reward.Text: Will pulverise your grinding issues to a fine mist.

Reward.Name: Two-Man Saw
Reward.Text: See-saw no more, with this speedy saw.

Reward.Name: Leghold Trap
Reward.Text: This certainly makes sure they won't get away.

Reward.Name: Lopper
Reward.Text: Keeping pruning tradition alive.

Reward.Name: Cast Steel Plough
Reward.Text: An extremely balanced approach to agriculture!

Reward.Name: Drill Press
Reward.Text: A mechanical drill to reduce operator effort.

Reward.Name: Precision Monocular
Reward.Text: Allows your precision craftsman to examine the fine details.

Reward.Name: Drift Net
Reward.Text: Originating on the so-named "crab coast," this whopper of a net is a treat for fishermen.

Reward.Name: Iron Factory Bell
Reward.Text: Once heard, cannot be unheard.

Reward.Name: Steam Turbine
Reward.Text: A safe source of electric power.

Reward.Name: Reverberatory Furnace
Reward.Text: Saves time, but not the environment.

Reward.Name: French Burrstone
Reward.Text: Will pulverise your grinding issues to a fine mist.

Reward.Name: Safety Steam-Powered Elevator
Reward.Text: A steam-geared elevator that can lift ten tonnes in one go.

Reward.Name: Cast Iron Stove
Reward.Text: A way into fast food!

Threshold.Name: 7 Powered Machines
Threshold.Text: A selection of newly designed machines that use electricity to achieve miracles.

Reward.Name: Helical Planner
Reward.Text: Helical design creates less cutting waste.

Reward.Name: Steam-Powered Brewing Machine
Reward.Text: Rapidly accelerates the brewing process.

Reward.Name: Power Loom
Reward.Text: A semi-automatic loom with bells and whistles

Reward.Name: Glass Mechanical Press
Reward.Text: Blow glass bubbles with modern speed and efficiency.

Reward.Name: Electric Circular Rip Saw
Reward.Text: They can't wait to get its teeth stuck into it.

Reward.Name: Hydraulic Press
Reward.Text: Encourages rigid uniformity.

Reward.Name: Electric Assembly Line
Reward.Text: Gets everything nicely into line.

Reward.Name: Electric Powered Pumps
Reward.Text: Make your beverages speak the language of tradition with this extraordinarily capacious distiller.

Reward.Name: Electric Treadle Lathe
Reward.Text: Harker's lathe cuts through wood and metal like dough. Just make sure your fingers are well clear!

Reward.Name: Compacting Machine
Reward.Text: Neither human nor machine has yet produced faster, more uniform masonry than Mickleton's compactor.

Reward.Name: Fein Electric Drill
Reward.Text: Bores holes in the earth's crust, using the frightening power of electricity!

Reward.Name: Vaughan Drag Saw
Reward.Text: Vincent's flabbergasting creation will chop it all for you!

Reward.Name: Fur Stretcher
Reward.Text: A particularly clean and efficient dispatcher of mink.

Reward.Name: Original LÖWE
Reward.Text: A springy yet safe clipper of clippables from the near-future!

Reward.Name: Steel Seed Drill
Reward.Text: Precisely contoured modern materials make this seed drill a farmer's fantasy.

Reward.Name: Kruder Loupe
Reward.Text: Designed by the very artisans who use them, this magnifier guaranteees quality.

Reward.Name: Brixham Bottom Trawl
Reward.Text: Drifts about looking for extra fish.

Threshold.Name: 8 Agricultural Revolution
Threshold.Text: All you need for a very efficient and modern farming industry.

Reward.Name: Selected Grain Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Grain yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Hop Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Hops yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Potato Seeds
Reward.Text: These sprouts have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Potato yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Grape Seeds
Reward.Text: These vines have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Grape yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Bell Pepper Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Pepper yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Sugar Cane Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Sugar yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Tobacco Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Tobacco yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Cotton Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Cotton yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Cocoa Seeds
Reward.Text: These beans have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Cocoa yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Caoutchouc Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Caoutchouc yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Coffee Seeds
Reward.Text: These beans have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Coffee yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Corn Seeds
Reward.Text: These seeds have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Corn yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Banana Seeds
Reward.Text: These saplings have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of soils, and with increased Plantain yield!

Reward.Name: Selected Pearls Seeds
Reward.Text: These oysters have been adapted to grow in a very wide range of seas, and with increased yield!

Reward.Name: Feedlots
Reward.Text: If the little critters can't have free range, let them at least have comfort.

Reward.Name: Straw Mixed Compost Shed
Reward.Text: As glamurous as waste management gets, and a rich source of natural fertiliser.

Reward.Name: SuperPhosphate Fertilizers
Reward.Text: A synthetic fertiliser of remarkable fecundity, and ah..potency!

Reward.Name: Anthrax Vaccine
Reward.Text: Lost count of anthrax deaths on your farm? This vaccine can set your worries aside!

Threshold.Name: 9 Unique Inventions
Threshold.Text: The latest inventions of the most talented engineers of the era.

Reward.Name: Parsons Turbo Generator
Reward.Text: A highly-efficient and safe source of electrical power!

Reward.Name: Bessemer Converter
Reward.Text: An smelting innovation that saves both time and effort!

Reward.Name: Grinding Machine Lieberman
Reward.Text: A very lovely grinder that even has its own cooling system.

Reward.Name: Siemens Electric Elevator
Reward.Text: Performing solely on electricity, the Simmons has no rival in ferrying things up and down at break-neck speed!

Reward.Name: Smith Electric Stove
Reward.Text: Elmer's thermo-electric miracle will help chef patrons at even the busiest lunch service.

Reward.Name: The Cutting Edge
Reward.Text: A radical redesign that makes cutting efficient and effortless!

Reward.Name: Roberts Loom
Reward.Text: The shuttle of the mighty Hopedale Loom even replenishes when empty!

Reward.Name: Owens Bottle Blowing Machine
Reward.Text: Oriel's ingenious machine sometimes gets carried away blowing bubbles on its own!

Reward.Name: Grinding Machine Lieberman
Reward.Text: A very lovely grinder that even has its own cooling system.

Reward.Name: Thiele Tube
Reward.Text: The most accurate of all melting point measurement systems known in this century!

Reward.Name: Portsmouth Block Mills
Reward.Text: An all-metal assembly line that permits your employees to simply stand back and watch!

Reward.Name: Oxford Electric Bell
Reward.Text: Shirkers begone! The shrill cry of a new day has sounded!

Reward.Name: Dynamic Loudspeaker
Reward.Text: You only have to clear your throat and they obey.

Reward.Name: Loudspeaker harbour network
Reward.Text: Extremely clear communication means a lightning-quick response!

Reward.Name: Railroad Construction Crane
Reward.Text: An extremely large and powerful crane for shipbuilding.

Reward.Name: Wooden Tower Construction Crane
Reward.Text: Lift a burden off your shipwrights.

Reward.Name: Railroad Repair Crane
Reward.Text: A crane with a very broad range of massage techniques.

Reward.Name: Hydraulic Repair Crane
Reward.Text: You have to crane your neck to see the top of this giant of construction.

Reward.Name: Controllable-Pitch Propeller
Reward.Text: A powerful propeller, that is also rather versatile.

Reward.Name: Multiple Expansion Steam Engine
Reward.Text: An exceptional design that gives your steamships a bit of oomph at the crucial moment.

Reward.Name: First Radar, the Telemobiloscope
Reward.Text: A surveyor of the sea, it detects the presence of metallic bodies all around.

Reward.Name: Bulkheads
Reward.Text: A heavy armour for vessels expecting to be peppered with ammunition.

Reward.Name: Steel Double-Hull
Reward.Text: Shipwright Singh's hulls are designed specifically to combat a misfortune of modern projectiles.

Category.Name: Archaeological Discoveries
Category.Text: A cabinet of curiosities bursting with antique sculptures, writings and art pieces.

Event.Name: Modest Archaeological Exhibition
Event.Text: These splendid artifacts from the past will make our curator happy!

Threshold.Name: 1 Curiosities
Threshold.Text: A few old possessions and statues of little value.

Reward.Name: copper coins
Reward.Text: Of historical value only.

Reward.Name: tarnished necklace
Reward.Text: Seems a humble necklace now, but back then...

Reward.Name: wooden ring
Reward.Text: The bright pigment of its life has faded.

Reward.Name: stone statue
Reward.Text: An elegant statue that has sadly at some point been defaced.

Reward.Name: broken statue
Reward.Text: Believed to represent an ancient female deity.

Reward.Name: quartz
Reward.Text: A semi-precious mineral of transparent beauty.

Reward.Name: pyrite crystals
Reward.Text: Pyrite is a mineral of uncannily geometric geology.

Threshold.Name: 2 Everyday Material
Threshold.Text: The spartan possessions of an ancient warrior.

Reward.Name: copper coins
Reward.Text: Of historical value only.

Reward.Name: tarnished necklace
Reward.Text: Seems a humble necklace now, but back then...

Reward.Name: wooden ring
Reward.Text: The bright pigment of its life has faded.

Reward.Name: silver coins
Reward.Text: Pocket money to a prince.

Reward.Name: silver necklace
Reward.Text: The sliver of a pendant has done well to survive this long.

Reward.Name: copper ring
Reward.Text: The corroded ring of a notable wool merchant, perhaps?

Reward.Name: bronze helmet
Reward.Text: A dent hints at the fate of its original owner.

Reward.Name: wooden shield
Reward.Text: All a poor soldier had to defend themselves.

Reward.Name: bronze sword
Reward.Text: Rust has consumed nearly all of the blade.

Threshold.Name: 3 Handcrafting
Threshold.Text: The remains of a modest tomb.

Reward.Name: silver coins
Reward.Text: Pocket money to a prince.

Reward.Name: silver necklace
Reward.Text: The sliver of a pendant has done well to survive this long.

Reward.Name: copper ring
Reward.Text: The corroded ring of a notable wool merchant, perhaps?

Reward.Name: mummy bandages
Reward.Text: The mummy itself is gone, do you think...? No, surely not!

Reward.Name: colored fabric
Reward.Text: Sealed in glass to preserve the vivid colour of the fabric.

Reward.Name: iron helmet
Reward.Text: Intact. Maybe this warrior died of natural causes?

Reward.Name: iron shield
Reward.Text: A protective iron disc found in a warrior's grave.

Reward.Name: iron sword
Reward.Text: This sword was among the belongings of a fallen warrior.

Threshold.Name: 4 Ancient Writings
Threshold.Text: Old writings, some of which are now of great value.

Reward.Name: ancient tales
Reward.Text: Wise old tales of folk.

Reward.Name: ancient accounts
Reward.Text: Antique book-keeping was much as it is now.

Reward.Name: ancient novel
Reward.Text: A profound work of fiction rather novel for its time.

Reward.Name: past deeds
Reward.Text: Some monk's tireless work of divine calligraphy.

Reward.Name: lined stone
Reward.Text: Illustrations spanning hundreds of metres over pebble.

Reward.Name: old medicine treaty
Reward.Text: An ancient treatise on medical practices anatomical and physiological.

Reward.Name: ragnarsdrápa
Reward.Text: Sagas that regale the life and feats of the old Northen kings.

Threshold.Name: 5 Rich Furnitures
Threshold.Text: Some remains that once belonged to a wealthy person.

Reward.Name: gold coins
Reward.Text: Some went their whole lives without ever seeing one.

Reward.Name: celtic jewellery
Reward.Text: The acme of early Goidelic metalwork in its gilt silver filigree.

Reward.Name: silver ring
Reward.Text: An old silver ring inscribed a script of indiscernible origin.

Reward.Name: monkey-tooth amulet
Reward.Text: This nazcan monkey god grins away your envy.

Reward.Name: jade pearl
Reward.Text: The soft green radiance of this polished gem conjures up the imperial east.

Reward.Name: poseidon statue
Reward.Text: A classical statue of the god of the sea, sculpted in Aegean marble.

Reward.Name: mummy bandages
Reward.Text: The mummy itself is gone, do you think...? No, surely not!

Reward.Name: colored fabric
Reward.Text: Sealed in glass to preserve the vivid colour of the fabric.

Reward.Name: iron helmet
Reward.Text: Intact. Maybe this warrior died of natural causes?

Reward.Name: iron shield
Reward.Text: A protective iron disc found in a warrior's grave.

Reward.Name: iron sword
Reward.Text: This sword was among the belongings of a fallen warrior.

Reward.Name: silver coins
Reward.Text: Pocket money to a prince.

Reward.Name: silver necklace
Reward.Text: The sliver of a pendant has done well to survive this long.

Reward.Name: copper ring
Reward.Text: The corroded ring of a notable wool merchant, perhaps?

Reward.Name: stone statue
Reward.Text: An elegant statue that has sadly at some point been defaced.

Reward.Name: pyrite crystals
Reward.Text: Pyrite is a mineral of uncannily geometric geology.

Event.Name: Large Archaeological Exhibition
Event.Text: These splendid artifacts from the past will make our curator happy!

Threshold.Name: 3 Handcrafting
Threshold.Text: The remains of a modest tomb.

Reward.Name: silver coins
Reward.Text: Pocket money to a prince.

Reward.Name: silver necklace
Reward.Text: The sliver of a pendant has done well to survive this long.

Reward.Name: copper ring
Reward.Text: The corroded ring of a notable wool merchant, perhaps?

Reward.Text: The mummy itself is gone, do you think...? No, surely not!

Reward.Name: iron helmet
Reward.Text: Intact. Maybe this warrior died of natural causes?

Reward.Name: iron shield
Reward.Text: A protective iron disc found in a warrior's grave.

Reward.Name: iron sword
Reward.Text: This sword was among the belongings of a fallen warrior.

Reward.Text: Wise old tales of folk.

Reward.Text: Antique book-keeping was much as it is now.

Reward.Text: Illustrations spanning hundreds of metres over pebble.

Reward.Text: An ancient treatise on medical practices anatomical and physiological.

Reward.Name: gold coins
Reward.Text: Some went their whole lives without ever seeing one.

Reward.Text: The acme of early Goidelic metalwork in its gilt silver filigree.

Reward.Name: silver ring
Reward.Text: An old silver ring inscribed a script of indiscernible origin.

Reward.Text: The mummy itself is gone, do you think...? No, surely not!

Reward.Text: Sealed in glass to preserve the vivid colour of the fabric.

Reward.Name: iron helmet
Reward.Text: Intact. Maybe this warrior died of natural causes?

Reward.Name: iron shield
Reward.Text: A protective iron disc found in a warrior's grave.

Reward.Name: iron sword
Reward.Text: This sword was among the belongings of a fallen warrior.

Reward.Name: silver coins
Reward.Text: Pocket money to a prince.

Reward.Name: silver necklace
Reward.Text: The sliver of a pendant has done well to survive this long.

Reward.Name: copper ring
Reward.Text: The corroded ring of a notable wool merchant, perhaps?

Reward.Name: stone statue
Reward.Text: An elegant statue that has sadly at some point been defaced.

Reward.Name: pyrite crystals
Reward.Text: Pyrite is a mineral of uncannily geometric geology.

Threshold.Name: 6 Noble Funerary Material
Threshold.Text: Funerary textiles buried with a noble in her tomb.

Reward.Name: ornate fabric
Reward.Text: Intricate patterns were woven into this fragile musky fabric.

Reward.Name: decayed mummy
Reward.Text: An as yet unidentified king or queen of the upper delta.

Reward.Name: gold coins
Reward.Text: Some went their whole lives without ever seeing one.

Reward.Name: celtic jewellery
Reward.Text: The acme of early Goidelic metalwork in its gilt silver filigree.

Reward.Name: silver ring
Reward.Text: An old silver ring inscribed a script of indiscernible origin.

Reward.Name: monkey-tooth amulet
Reward.Text: This nazcan monkey god grins away your envy.

Reward.Name: silver helmet
Reward.Text: A ceremonial silver headpiece of beauty, but unknown provenance.

Reward.Name: silver shield
Reward.Text: A ceremonial shield you can see your face in— just don't fight with it.

Reward.Name: silver sword
Reward.Text: A ceremonial silver sword that clearly only ever served a decorative purpose.

Reward.Name: golden helmet
Reward.Text: A lavish gilt headpiece engraved with war scenes its wearer had perhaps witnessed.

Reward.Name: ornate broadsword
Reward.Text: A fearsome sword no doubt wielded by the most dreaded old cove of old coves.

Reward.Name: old medicine treaty
Reward.Text: An ancient treatise on medical practices anatomical and physiological.

Reward.Name: ragnarsdrápa
Reward.Text: Sagas that regale the life and feats of the old Northen kings.

Threshold.Name: 7 Natural History
Threshold.Text: A pack of bones from creatures long gone.

Reward.Name: t-rex
Reward.Text: Tyrannosaurus Rex. The mere sight of its skeleton is enough to leave the bravest schoolchild cowering.

Reward.Name: sauropoda
Reward.Text: Apatosaurus Ajax. One of the largest creatures to ever wander the Earth, how did it hold up its own weight?

Reward.Name: mosasaurus
Reward.Text: Mosasaurus Hoffmanni. Who'd have thought such a vast creature once roamed the oceans, casually snacking on sharks.

Reward.Name: stegosaurus
Reward.Text: Stegosaurus Armatus. Characterised by the triangular plates that it wore on its back.

Reward.Name: neanderthal skeleton
Reward.Text: Homo neanderthalensis. Found in embedded in mud-clay, it is a revelation as to the place of humans in nature.

Reward.Name: redbeard's skeleton
Reward.Text: Skeleton of a king among corsairs, who shall be saluted with cannons before we sail to sea.

Reward.Name: nazcan mummy
Reward.Text: The body of an nazcan girl wrapped in a bundle of clothes, found frozen in ice.

Reward.Name: fossils
Reward.Text: The fossilised spiral shells of long-lost species of marine molluscs.

Reward.Name: dinosaur eggs
Reward.Text: Those who stumbled upon these fossilised eggs at first mistook them for those of a giant bird.

Event.Name: Somptuous Archaeological Exhibition
Event.Text: These splendid artifacts from the past will make our curator happy!

Threshold.Name: 5 Rich Furnitures
Threshold.Text: Some remains that once belonged to a wealthy person.

Reward.Name: gold coins
Reward.Text: Some went their whole lives without ever seeing one.

Reward.Name: celtic jewellery
Reward.Text: The acme of early Goidelic metalwork in its gilt silver filigree.

Reward.Name: silver ring
Reward.Text: An old silver ring inscribed a script of indiscernible origin.

Reward.Name: monkey-tooth amulet
Reward.Text: This nazcan monkey god grins away your envy.

Reward.Name: jade pearl
Reward.Text: The soft green radiance of this polished gem conjures up the imperial east.

Reward.Text: A classical statue of the god of the sea, sculpted in Aegean marble.

Reward.Name: mummy bandages
Reward.Text: The mummy itself is gone, do you think...? No, surely not!

Reward.Name: colored fabric
Reward.Text: Sealed in glass to preserve the vivid colour of the fabric.

Reward.Name: iron helmet
Reward.Text: Intact. Maybe this warrior died of natural causes?

Reward.Name: iron shield
Reward.Text: A protective iron disc found in a warrior's grave.

Reward.Name: iron sword
Reward.Text: This sword was among the belongings of a fallen warrior.

Reward.Name: silver coins
Reward.Text: Pocket money to a prince.

Reward.Name: silver necklace
Reward.Text: The sliver of a pendant has done well to survive this long.

Reward.Name: copper ring
Reward.Text: The corroded ring of a notable wool merchant, perhaps?

Reward.Name: stone statue
Reward.Text: An elegant statue that has sadly at some point been defaced.

Reward.Name: pyrite crystals
Reward.Text: Pyrite is a mineral of uncannily geometric geology.

Threshold.Text: Funerary textiles buried with a noble in her tomb.

Reward.Name: ornate fabric
Reward.Text: Intricate patterns were woven into this fragile musky fabric.

Reward.Text: An as yet unidentified king or queen of the upper delta.

Reward.Text: Some went their whole lives without ever seeing one.

Reward.Text: An old silver ring inscribed a script of indiscernible origin.

Reward.Name: silver shield
Reward.Text: A ceremonial shield you can see your face in— just don't fight with it.

Reward.Text: A ceremonial silver sword that clearly only ever served a decorative purpose.

Reward.Name: golden helmet
Reward.Text: A lavish gilt headpiece engraved with war scenes its wearer had perhaps witnessed.

Reward.Name: ornate broadsword
Reward.Text: A fearsome sword no doubt wielded by the most dreaded old cove of old coves.

Reward.Name: old medicine treaty
Reward.Text: An ancient treatise on medical practices anatomical and physiological.

Reward.Name: ragnarsdrápa
Reward.Text: Sagas that regale the life and feats of the old Northen kings.

Threshold.Name: 7 Natural History
Threshold.Text: A pack of bones from creatures long gone.

Reward.Name: t-rex
Reward.Text: Tyrannosaurus Rex. The mere sight of its skeleton is enough to leave the bravest schoolchild cowering.

Reward.Name: sauropoda
Reward.Text: Apatosaurus Ajax. One of the largest creatures to ever wander the Earth, how did it hold up its own weight?

Reward.Name: mosasaurus
Reward.Text: Mosasaurus Hoffmanni. Who'd have thought such a vast creature once roamed the oceans, casually snacking on sharks.

Reward.Name: stegosaurus
Reward.Text: Stegosaurus Armatus. Characterised by the triangular plates that it wore on its back.

Reward.Name: neanderthal skeleton
Reward.Text: Homo neanderthalensis. Found in embedded in mud-clay, it is a revelation as to the place of humans in nature.

Reward.Name: redbeard's skeleton
Reward.Text: Skeleton of a king among corsairs, who shall be saluted with cannons before we sail to sea.

Reward.Text: The body of an nazcan girl wrapped in a bundle of clothes, found frozen in ice.

Reward.Text: The fossilised spiral shells of long-lost species of marine molluscs.

Reward.Name: dinosaur eggs
Reward.Text: Those who stumbled upon these fossilised eggs at first mistook them for those of a giant bird.

Threshold.Name: 8 Mythical Artifacts
Threshold.Text: Legendary artifacts that no one thought could be real.

Reward.Name: valkyrie helmet
Reward.Text: Its plated wings are reminiscent of the mythological Nordic riders who lived and died on the battlefield.

Reward.Name: nibelungen ring
Reward.Text: Ring of Nordic legend said to grant its bearer the power to rule the earth, and set the Old Gods in disarray.

Reward.Name: dyrnwyn
Reward.Text: Legendary blade of a generous Goidelic ruler, it is said when drawn by one worthy, the blade shall blaze with fire.

Reward.Name: edda
Reward.Text: A fabled collection of epic poems that gives us a window into the life and mythology of Nordic peoples.

Reward.Name: the iliad
Reward.Text: Truly an epic! This poem passed to us from oral tradition, recounts the siege of Troy.

Reward.Name: the odyssey
Reward.Text: The man of many ways, finds many ways to get home to his disbelieving wife and son.

Reward.Name: ben sahid treasure
Reward.Text: The many and varied treasures of Ben Sahid, greatest pirate of all time.

Reward.Name: ancient king shroud
Reward.Text: Claims about its authenticity are suitably flimsy, but if it is what it is said to be...

Reward.Name: diamond
Reward.Text: A particularly large and lustrous specimen of the world's most desirable rock.

Reward.Name: pakal's necklaces
Reward.Text: Belonged to Takal of the Sun, the deified monarch that reigned for fifty years.

Reward.Name: golden ring
Reward.Text: Fits only the slender finger of the rightful heir to a forgotten kingdom.

Threshold.Name: 9 Ancient Architecture
Threshold.Text: The remains of the greatest constructions from the past.

Reward.Name: uppsala altar
Reward.Text: Sacrificial altar of a Nordic temple, where nine males of every sort of living creature were offered to the gods.

Reward.Name: stonehenge
Reward.Text: Celestial energy resonates between these awesome stones, so go ahead, grab a chisel and take some home!

Reward.Name: temple of poseidon
Reward.Text: A remarkably well-preserved monument of the Aegean Golden Age that smacks of dolphins and fish.

Reward.Name: mayan temple
Reward.Text: The temple of the Great Jaguar. Once an important place of ritual, and gateway to the underworld.

Reward.Name: menhirs
Reward.Text: These towering standing stones are the gatekeepers to a bygone era.

Reward.Name: olympieion remains
Reward.Text: Walking among the reliefs of lapiths and centaurs transports one to the Aegean age.

Reward.Name: roman sanctuary
Reward.Text: Part of a gentle sanctuary built to honour a goddess of strategy and warfare.

Reward.Name: dolmen
Reward.Text: A T-shaped megalithic tomb where it is thought purifying funeral rites were held.

Reward.Name: nazcan tombs
Reward.Text: The final resting place of the ancient dwellers of the black desert.

Reward.Name: mayan sea port
Reward.Text: The harbour of an ancient port that may have traded with the distant Old world in turquoise and jade.

Reward.Name: forum remains
Reward.Text: TA last vestige of the beating heart of the Empire of the Eagle, senators and emperors wandered these halls.

Reward.Name: mayan house
Reward.Text: A simple house can be a treasure vault of intriguing detail as to how we used to live.

Reward.Name: mayan calendar
Reward.Text: Ingenious cyclical calendar system of stone, that predicts the world will end in about two-hundred years!

Reward.Name: lascaux paintings
Reward.Text: Perfectly preserved cave paintings depicting the many animal companions of our great ancestors.

Reward.Name: celtic carving
Reward.Text: Intricately interlaced stone carvings, a hallmark of Goidelic ritual and belief.

Reward.Name: prehistorical painting
Reward.Text: Early paintings of bisons in charcoal and ochre so exquisite, they have been called a fraud.

Reward.Name: drakkar carving
Reward.Text: A fine carving of the old vessels led by dragon prows which once sailed Northern seas.

Reward.Name: corinthian mosaic
Reward.Text: Concentric patterns of ivy or vine make one feel as dizzy as a guest of the deity.

Reward.Name: mayan glyphs
Reward.Text: The stone tiles of a lost city, adorned with scarcely decipherable hieroglyphs.

Reward.Name: roman mosaic
Reward.Text: An epic depiction of east and west meeting in battle comprised of miniature stone tiles.
